page.title: 18Job Survey.
page.content: We did a survey of our school.We went around all the classes and interviewed the children about the jobs their parents did.This is the list we made: No.of people. Places of work. 48 House Person. 41 Armed Forces. 32 Nursery/Gardens. 18 Building. 16 Schools. 10 Pubs/Hotels/Nursing Home. 8 Shops/Social Services. 7 Jam Factory/Cleaners/Public Service 6 Sales Person. 5 Garage/Computers. 4 Medical Services. 3 Farmer/Self Employed. 2 Hairdresser/Electrical/Playschool. 1 Meteorology/Transport/Entertainment Unemployed/Window Cleaner/Brewery/ Lumberjack/Architect/Potter/Plumber Metal Worker/Carpenter/Painter.
